title: Tot mom Casey Anthony launches legal battle after she’s acquitted in tot-daughters murder
itunes:title: Tot mom Casey Anthony launches legal battle after she’s acquitted in tot-daughters murder
description:
Casey Anthony is still fighting a lawsuit related to the death of her daughter almost a decade ago. Tot Mom wants a court to toss a defamation lawsuit filed by the meter reader who found Florida toddler Caylee Anthony's remains in a swampy area near Anthony's home. Los Angeles psycho analyst Dr. Bethany Marshall and RadarOnline.com reporter Alexis Tereszcuk join Nancy Grace in this Crime Stories episode to discuss the latest in the Casey Anthony case.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
